title: So, why give Miss Fortune Power that would make her relevant, then take it away?
body:
Miss Fortune
Impure Shots (W) active attack speed gain reverted to 20/30/40/50/60 from 50/55/60/65/70

Am I missing something? She kinda needs that buff to effectively bully in lane, because that is still all she will excel at compared to other adc's.

replies.body:
I really don't know either, but if the attack speed they did give was too much _AT LEAST_ put it to 40/45/50/55/60 or maybe even 30/40/50/60/70. 

It doesn't do grievous wounds anymore so no clue. 

But hopefully they revert it back to what it was or what I said above.
